comment.body:
Hi,

It's really annoying to see this blank ad window opening many times with url http://tsyndicate.com/api/v1/direct/b96c485a6d134e039c573a63a80e7b486311cada80f6faaca0de3fba0ef4625c4930f00d?spot=b96c485a6d134e039c573a63a80e7b486311cada80f6faaca0de3fba0ef4625c4930f00d&subid_1=xhamster18.desi&subid_3=rec_index_b&abt=middle_group_b&xvr=0&xoc=straight&xtype=cams&xma=0&categories

Is there anyone who could help me block this ad windows from opening.

Waiting for your help

Thanks
